item.title: What we know about the joint US-Israel attack on Iran
item.summary: Iran has retaliated with a missile barrage towards Israel, while explosions have been heard in Qatar, Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE.

item.title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
item.summary: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".

item.title: At least 15 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
item.summary: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site.

item.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
item.summary: The move announced on social media comes after a standoff between Anthropic's boss and the US Department of Defense.

item.title: A 'delicate' balance for Canada and a 'win-win' for Modi as Carney visits India
item.summary: The two countries are repairing a strained relationship as they also seek to reduce their trade reliance on the US.

item.title: Aid groups in Gaza and West Bank thrown lifeline as Israel court pauses ban threat
item.summary: Dozens of well-known groups faced shutdown under a new Israeli law, although the reprieve might be temporary.

item.title: DOJ charges 30 more people in Minnesota anti-ICE church protest
item.summary: Ex-CNN anchor Don Lemon was one of the original nine defendants arrested last month

item.title: Tram derails in Milan, leaving two dead and dozens injured
item.summary: The crowded tram was travelling in the centre of Milan at rush hour when it appeared to crash into the side of a building.

item.title: Pakistan defence minister says country in 'open war' with Afghanistan after strikes
item.summary: The latest attacks by Pakistan follow months of clashes between the two countries. despite agreeing to a fragile ceasefire in October.

item.title: Why Trump means the Cuban Revolution faces its biggest threat yet
item.summary: Will a worsening internal crisis create the conditions for the Cuban Revolution to unravel from within?
